title: HCT116 wt rep1
characteristics_ch1: cell type: human colon carcinoma cell line
growth_protocol_ch1: Cells were maintained in 10 cm dishes in Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle Medium (DMEM) at 37°C and 5% CO2. Culture medium was supplemented with growth factors from 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS) and 1% Penicillin/ Streptavidin to avoid bacterial growth and contamination.
extract_protocol_ch1: Total RNA was extracted using RNeasy Mini Kit (QIAGEN).
extract_protocol_ch1.1: TruSeq RNA library preparation and Illumina HiSeq2500 sequencing with 25 million 150bp single reads per library were performed by the Max Planck-Genome-Center Cologne, Germany.
data_processing: After quality control, reads were mapped using TopHat2 (v 2.0.9, default settings) against the Human Genome (version hg19).
data_processing.1: Differential expression (log2FC, p-value, q-value) was done with cuffdiff (v2.1.1, default settings) using the accepted_hits.bam file for each sample comparing wild-type to trisomic cell line.
contact_institute: Aix-Marseille University, CNRS, IBDM UMR 7288, 13009 Marseille, France
